options.label: Light Shield (Defense +1 in melee) and Shield Bash (A2)

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12” get the Furious special rule.
specialRules.name: Battle Drills
specialRules.label: Battle Drills
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12” get the Furious special rule.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one of the following orders, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Double Time: +3” when moving • Take Aim: +1 to shooting rolls • Focus Fire: AP(+1) when shooting • Fix Bayonets: +1 to melee rolls Company Standard: This unit gets the Fear special rule, and it and all friendly units within 12” get the Fearless special rules.
specialRules.name: Commander
specialRules.label: Commander
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one of the following orders, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Double Time: +3” when moving • Take Aim: +1 to shooting rolls • Focus Fire: AP(+1) when shooting • Fix Bayonets: +1 to melee rolls Company Standard: This unit gets the Fear special rule, and it and all friendly units within 12” get the Fearless special rules.

specialRules.hint: Whenever a friendly unit within 12” fails a morale test you must kill one friendly model within 12” that the hero has line of sight to and then all friendly units within 12” of the killed model automatically pass morale tests until the end of the round.
specialRules.name: Executioner
specialRules.label: Executioner
specialRules.description: Whenever a friendly unit within 12” fails a morale test you must kill one friendly model within 12” that the hero has line of sight to and then all friendly units within 12” of the killed model automatically pass morale tests until the end of the round.

specialRules.hint: If a Commander is within 6”, then it may give orders from the position of a unit with a Field Radio up to 24” away instead of from his own position.
specialRules.name: Field Radio
specialRules.label: Field Radio
specialRules.description: If a Commander is within 6”, then it may give orders from the position of a unit with a Field Radio up to 24” away instead of from his own position.

specialRules.hint: This model and all friendly units within 12” get the Regeneration rule.
specialRules.name: Medical Training
specialRules.label: Medical Training
specialRules.description: This model and all friendly units within 12” get the Regeneration rule.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protective Dome
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Expel
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Psychic Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
